item.description:
A mainstay in CT, McDonald Teague Band serves up the Musical Gumbo with a flair.
Burt Teague, the 2 time Hartford Advocate best Guitarist, and Tim McDonald, Advocate nominee for best Guitarist, Vocalist, and Solo Performer have a synergy that almost sounds like one big guitar. Along with the funkiest, slinkiest Rhythm Section with Doug LaChapelle on drums and Neal Hatcher on Bass, the band simply rocks the house with Blues, Funk, and Roots music.

Bill will be your host. He will be there for at 7:30 Band Starts at 9:30
item.how_to_find_us: A Table will be reserved in the West Hartford Meet Up group

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: McDonald Teague Band
